content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** *inside the paid pattern you will find - detailed written instructions - clear photos at the end of the pattern explaining assembly - required tools approximate yardage required* this adorable crochet pouch is a wonderful beginner project that uses single_crochet and chain stitches use your favourite worsted weight cotton yarn and personalize your mini pouch with a fun button it s a great stash buster or market prep pattern ideas for use lip balm hair elastics or hair clips earbuds small charge cables for cell phone/tablet a few pieces of folded up tissue crochet accessories stitch markers tape measure buttons etc *this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase * please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products please consider sharing a photo of your beautiful work snap a picture of your finished pouch and give me a tag on instagram @sweet_bee_crochet i d love to see happy crocheting
